html.p:
Client filtering can be performed using fields from sourcetype:fixlet_results or sourcetype:clients.
For example:
host=sys*
group=Win7
host=* os=Win*
host=* bigfix_server=bescore

table.title: Overview
table.searchTemplate: savedsearch=bigfix sourcetype=clients | search $filter$ | dedup host, bigfix_server | table host, client_id, src_ip, dns_name, user_name, os, ad_path, bigfix_server, _time

chart.title: Reports Over Time
chart.searchTemplate: savedsearch=bigfix sourcetype=clients | search $filter$ | timechart count by host

table.title: Relevant Fixlets
table.searchTemplate: savedsearch=bigfix sourcetype=fixlet_results type=Fixlet | dedup host, fixlet_id, fixlet_name, fixlet_site, bigfix_server | search relevant=True | join host, client_id, bigfix_server [search savedsearch=bigfix sourcetype=clients] | search $filter$ | top fixlet_id, fixlet_site, fixlet_name, source_release_date, open_action_count, bigfix_server showperc=f | sort -count, fixlet_site, fixlet_name
